Name: Naughty German
Ingredients: 10 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Jägermeister spice and rich cassis combine wonderfully in this after-dinner sipper, with subtle black liquorice and aniseed.
History: Created in 2017 by Florian Beuren , Jägermeister's UK brand ambassador.
Nutrition: One serving of Naughty German contains 151 calories
